trans-unit.source: To reset your password, enter the email address stored in the backend user account.
trans-unit.target: To reset your password, enter the email address stored in the backend user account.

trans-unit.source: To reset your password, ensure that your new password matches the following requirements:
trans-unit.target: To reset your password, ensure that your new password matches the following requirements:

trans-unit.source: Note: If you're using a centralized user management system such as LDAP, OAuth or Active Directory, you might not receive an email.
trans-unit.target: Note: If you're using a centralized user management system such as LDAP, OAuth or Active Directory, you might not receive an email.

trans-unit.source: If a backend user with the email address "%s" exists, an email has been sent to this address. Please check your inbox and spam folder.
trans-unit.target: If a backend user with the email address "%s" exists, an email has been sent to this address. Please check your inbox and spam folder.

trans-unit.source: With your new credentials you can now log in to the TYPO3 backend.
trans-unit.target: With your new credentials you can now log in to the TYPO3 backend.

trans-unit.source: The entered email address is invalid. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: The entered email address is invalid. Please try again.

trans-unit.source: The password reset link is invalid or has expired.
trans-unit.target: The password reset link is invalid or has expired.

trans-unit.source: The password you entered is invalid or the passwords do not match. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: The password you entered is invalid or the passwords do not match. Please try again.
